mapper.select: SELECT A.ALARM_ID, A.ALARM_CONTENT, A.RECEIVER_ID, A.IS_READ, TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DATE, A.PRODUCT_ID, I.IMAGE_NAME, CASE D.LOW_CODE_VALUE WHEN '007' THEN 'purchased' WHEN '008' THEN 'sold' WHEN '009' THEN 'expired' WHEN '010' THEN 'reported' WHEN '011' THEN 'approved' WHEN '012' THEN 'rejected' WHEN '001' THEN 'reserved' ELSE 'unknown' END AS STATUS, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '001' THEN TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE NULL END AS RESERVATION_DATE, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '001' THEN TO_CHAR(R.REV_DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN TO_CHAR(B.BUY_DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN CASE WHEN B.BUY_DELIVERY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(B.BUY_DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN R.REV_DELIVERY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(R.REV_DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END AS DELIVERY_DATE, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN CASE WHEN B.BUY_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '즉시구매' WHEN R.REV_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '예약구매' ELSE '구매' END WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN CASE WHEN B.BUY_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '즉시구매' WHEN R.REV_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '예약구매' ELSE '구매' END ELSE NULL END AS PURCHASE_TYPE, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN BUYER.MEMBER_TEL WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN BUYER2.MEMBER_TEL ELSE NULL END AS BUYER_TEL, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN TO_CHAR(B2.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE NULL END AS BUY_DATE, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN B.BUY_QTY WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN B2.BUY_QTY WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN R.REV_QTY ELSE NULL END AS BUY_QTY, CASE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '007' THEN B.BUY_TOTAL_PRICE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN B2.BUY_TOTAL_PRICE WHEN D.LOW_CODE_VALUE = '008' THEN R.REV_TOTAL_PRICE ELSE NULL END AS BUY_TOTAL_PRICE, B2.BUY_ID, R.REV_ID FROM TB_ALARM A JOIN TB_CODE_DETAIL D ON A.ALARM_TYPE = D.DETAIL_CODE_ID JOIN TB_CODE C ON D.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON A.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGES I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID AND I.IMAGE_TYPE = '200' LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_RESERVATION R ON A.PRODUCT_ID = R.PRODUCT_ID AND A.RECEIVER_ID = R.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_BUY B ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID AND A.RECEIVER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER BUYER ON (B.MEMBER_ID = BUYER.MEMBER_ID OR R.MEMBER_ID = BUYER.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_BUY B2 ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B2.PRODUCT_ID AND TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(B2.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER BUYER2 ON B2.MEMBER_ID = BUYER2.MEMBER_ID WHERE C.TOP_CODE_NAME in('STATUS','REV_STATUS') AND A.RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId} ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ALARM A JOIN TB_CODE_DETAIL D ON A.ALARM_TYPE = D.DETAIL_CODE_ID JOIN TB_CODE C ON D.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID WHERE C.TOP_CODE_NAME = 'STATUS' AND A.RECEIVER_ID = #{memberId} AND A.IS_READ = 'N'
